title: New: jumpswim❀ – Do For Love (Feat. Ninna Lundberg)
body:
Denmark’s Ninna Lundberg cropped up last year with her stunning track, [Fall Out Of Love](https://soundcloud.

com/ninnalundb/fall-out-of-love), a blog and Hype Machine favourite. Now twelve months down the line, she’s lent her vocals to _Do For Love_, this fantastic first outing from South London’s **jumpswim❀ **(Jordan Randhawa). Recorded on relatively basic equipment, it’s a bold, soulful number, perfect for those lazy evenings. Check it out below.
